warningSigns.description: Personal warning signs that a crisis might be developing
examples: Difficulty sleeping or sleeping too much
Having thoughts of death or suicide

copingStrategies.description: Things you can do to help yourself feel better
examples: Take a warm bath or shower
Go for a walk in nature

socialSupport.description: People you can reach out to for support

environmentSafety.description: Steps to make your environment safer
examples: Remove or secure potentially harmful items
Ask someone to stay with you
Go to a safe location (friend's house, family member)
Create physical barriers to impulsive actions
The possibility that things will get better

crisisText.name: Crisis Text Template
crisisText.content: Hi, I'm having a really hard time right now and could use some support. Are you available to talk? If not, I understand and will reach out to someone else or a crisis line.

checkInRequest.name: Check-in Request
checkInRequest.content: Hey, I'm going through a tough time and was wondering if you could check in on me over the next few days? Just a text or call to see how I'm doing would mean a lot.

professionalContact.name: Professional Contact Template
professionalContact.content: Hello, I'm experiencing a mental health crisis and need immediate support. Can you help me or direct me to appropriate resources?
